Override Generic Dialogue.Description: Overwrites the bouquet acceptance dialogue. Please turn this off if you do not plan on dating Chrissy.

Entries.Chrissy: This is incredible! I wanna slurp yah! $6/-5 305 27	306 307 308 807/Wow, you’re actually not a complete moron. This is pretty neat. $1//This is cringe. $2//This reminds me of the time my little brother drank a candle, are you as thick as him? $2/-4/I AM THE LORD OF DARKNESS. $8//

Entries.ChrissyMail.SecretWoods: Hi @,^I want to explain everything, so please meet me in the secret forest tomorrow at noon. I promise I’m a good person.^^Thanks.^-Chrissy[#]Meet Me in the Woods
Entries.ChrissyMail.Picnic: Hey @,^Next Tuesday, come to the Cindersnap Forest. I want to do something special for all that you’ve done for me.^^And don’t forget to bring your juicy bottom.^^-Chrissy[#]@.
Entries.ChrissyMail.MagicShow: Dear @,^Tomorrow I’ve decided to host a magic show in town, and everyone is invited. It would mean the world to me if you came.^I cannot wait to see you.^^You know what I mean. Don’t make me say it to your face, you moron.^^-Chrissy[#]You better be there!

Entries.Chrissy0: MARRIAGE IS AWESOME. I CANNOT WAIT. $4#$e# FOREVER LOVE.$1
Entries.Chrissy1: I seriously can’t believe I’m so lucky. $4#$e# Back on my home planet, we don’t do weddings, so I never thought this would happen to me! $4

Entries.Chrissy: I love rainy days. $1#$e# Just the sound of the drops hitting the window soothes me. $1#$b# I’m not going soft, I just like the sky water! $4

Entries.Sun6: I hope I can talk to my uncle again soon. $3
Entries.Mon6: Things have been really awkward back at my house lately. $2

Entries.Chrissy: I love rainy days almost as much as I love you $1
